this-is-your-moment:
This is your moment. One small tap. One
 big shift. Let's see what's possible when
 you choose presence over autopilot.
lets-just-move-a-few-wires-around: Let's just move a few wires around.
failed-to-start-streak: Failed to start tracking. Please try again.
active-streak-exists: You already have an active streak!
active-streak-description: You've been alcohol-free for {{days}} days. Keep going!
streak-reset-successfully: Your alcohol-free journey has been reset successfully!
failed-to-reset-streak: Failed to reset tracking. Please try again.
every-new-beginning-holds-power-descript: You've chosen to reset your tracker, not your progress. Growth includes moments like this. No shame, just awareness.
what-was-your-main-reason-for-drinking: What was your main reason for drinking?
how-did-you-feel-after-drinking: How did you feel after drinking?
what-kind-of-support-would-be-most-helpf: What kind of support would be most helpful when you feel this way again?
